calculator.title: Lung Cancer Screening Eligibility Calculator
calculator.stopped_placeholder: How long ago did you stop? (years)
calculator.tooltip_body: This screening eligibility score is calculated using algorithms based on PLCOm2012 and National Lung Screening Trial (NLST) selection criteria, which include smoking history (pack-years), years since quitting, age, and other risk factors. The algorithm also incorporates air quality exposure (e.g. PM2.5, NO2) and presence of comorbidities like asthma or diabetes to assess relative exposure to lung health risk factors.
calculator.tooltip_note: We do NOT provide a medical diagnosis or a percentage risk of lung cancer. This calculator is purely informational and based on publicly available health data correlations. If your score is higher, consider discussing lung cancer screening eligibility with a clinician.
calculator.right_card_para: This screening eligibility score is calculated using algorithms based on PLCOm2012 and National Lung Screening Trial (NLST) selection criteria, which include smoking history (pack-years), years since quitting, age, and other risk factors. The algorithm also incorporates air quality exposure (e.g. PM2.5, NO2) and presence of comorbidities like asthma or diabetes to assess relative exposure to lung health risk factors.
calculator.right_card_note: We do NOT provide a medical diagnosis or a percentage risk of lung cancer.
calculator.right_card_disclaimer: This calculator is purely informational and based on publicly available health data correlations. If your score is higher, consider discussing lung cancer screening eligibility with a clinician.

hero.title: From Risk To Relief
hero.subtitle: Advancing lung-health screening through AI-enabled imaging technology and standardized clinical workflows. Strengthening early-detection pathways, supporting clinicians, and expanding access to modern lung-cancer screening across the region.

focus.heading: Our Strategic Focus Areas
focus.blurb: "From Risk To Relief" reflects our commitment to advancing earlier detection, improving clinical decision-making, and enabling compassionate, high-quality care for every patient and provider we support.

institutional.title: Institutional Partnerships
institutional.desc: Working with hospitals, diagnostic centers, and public-health networks to standardize lung-screening pathways.

reach.title: Population Reach
reach.desc: Extending early-screening availability across both urban and underserved regional communities.

scalability.title: Regional Scalability
scalability.desc: Building infrastructure for long-term expansion and cross-border adoption across Southeast Europe.

ai.title: AI Development
ai.desc: Advanced medical-imaging tools to support accurate, efficient CT interpretation for earlier clinical insight.

about.heading: Why this matters
about.body:
Lung cancer remains one of the most challenging diseases in the region, with late diagnosis contributing to high mortality rates. Increasing access to structured screening programs can improve early identification and dramatically elevate survival outcomes.

MAI Future is developing an integrated lung-screening platform designed to support clinicians in identifying early signs of lung disease with enhanced efficiency, accuracy, and diagnostic confidence.

Our approach unites advanced imaging technology, standardized assessment protocols, and secure data infrastructure to strengthen public-health outcomes in North Macedonia. We are building a clinically driven and operationally scalable framework for AI-supported lung-cancer screening, designed in collaboration with regional health stakeholders.

The platform combines structured CT-scan workflows, privacy-first medical cloud infrastructure, and validated imaging-support tools to help accelerate clinical decisions and shorten time-to-care. Our end-to-end system will enable seamless adoption in hospitals and diagnostic centers, offering secure data processing, clinician-focused review tools, and continuous performance refinement informed by real-world practice.

Join our waitlist to stay informed as we bring advanced lung-screening innovation to healthcare institutions across the region.
